name: Project Aeromail
description:
Project Aeromail is a 3D flying adventure game in which you can explore as an airplane and collect and deliver polaroid memories of different landmarks on the island. 

Controls:

  • W/S  or Up/Down Arrows - Tilt up or down.
  • A/D or Left/Right Arrows - Turn left or right.
  • Left Shift - Hold down for speed boost.
  • Left Ctrl - Hold down to slow down and get more control when turning.
  • Q/E - Toggle through available delivery zones.
  • Space - Toggle visibility of polaroid.

Team Rubber Ducks:

  • Alain Sangalang
  • Daniel MacCormick
  • Kody Wood
  • Wen Bo Yu

Project Aeromail was our team's first prototype with the goal of developing a demo under a 1 month development timeline with part-time game development. The current status of Aeromail is a released prototype that may or may not be developed further in the future. We hope you enjoy playing it and are open to feedback!
